text: Hasanids are the sons of Imam Hassan who is the brother of Imam Hussein and the grandson of Muhamad. They are one of the branches of the Alids (those who are the sons of Ali) and one of those most important branches of the Alids. The Hasanids unlike their brothers at the Husaynids are against the Abbasids and launched many unsucessful attacks against them. == References == == Sources == * * Category:Shia Islam
title: Hasanids
